title: Conor Hovis | Content Portfolio
tagline: Creating content that connects, engages, and delivers results
intro: Thanks for checking out my content I've created over the years! I selected some of my favorites and some to highlight various skills and formats. If you have anything specific that you don't see, but want to see, reach out and I can get it for you OR visit my LinkedIn Projects section to see more examples and details about each project.

I'm passionate about creating compelling visual content that tells stories and drives results. Whether it's transforming raw footage into engaging videos, crafting the perfect social media graphic, or developing comprehensive marketing materials, I love bringing creative visions to life.
